TextView.android:text: These will work on any Zebra device running DataWedge 6.0 or higher. Note the API changed between DW 6.0 and 6.3 and this section demonstrates the original 6.0 API to which future devices should be backwardly compatible.
These will work on any Zebra device running DataWedge 6.2 or higher
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT DATAWEDGE 6.2 APIs
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT 6.3 APIS
Received version info will go here
The created profile will configure DataWedge to send scans to this app via intent, provided no other profile is also associated with the activity
WARNING: Resets all user-configured settings and restores DataWedge to its factory settings.
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT 6.4 APIS
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT 6.5 APIS
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT DATAWEDGE 6.5 APIs
Received disabled app list will go here
Temporary effect, will not reflect in profile config
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT 6.6 APIS
This will enable reporting, set Manual Import and enable the option to show report after import.
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT 6.7 APIS
This imports the specified config file from folder path: /sdcard/DWconfigsample
YOUR DEVICE DOES NOT SUPPORT 6.8 APIS
When enabled, this prevents switching to a profile that is disabled.
When enabled, this updates multiple SimulScan parameters (presuming Sinulscan is enabled in the active profile), including:
